mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collect_folder (user_id, name, description, is_default, content_count, is_public, sort, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{isDefault}, #{contentCount}, #{isPublic}, #{sort}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, is_default, content_count, is_public, sort, create_time, update_time FROM collect_folder WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT id, user_id, name, description, is_default, content_count, is_public, sort, create_time, update_time FROM collect_folder WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1
